busy.user.web

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • busy.user.web.UserController

  • @Controller
 @SessionAttributes(value="user")
public class UserController
extends Object
    Controller for User operations, like Login or Sign up.
    Author:
    malkomich

      • index

        @RequestMapping(value="/login",
                method=GET)
public String index(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Shows the login page.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring model instance
        Returns:
        The login page

      • login

        @RequestMapping(value="/login",
                method=POST)
public String login(@ModelAttribute(value="loginForm")
                                                                                   LoginForm form,
                                                                                   org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                   org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
        Process the login form and validates it. If the user has been successfully validated, a redirect to root path or admin path (if the user is admin) is requested, otherwise the login page is shown again.
        Parameters:
        form - HTTP input request
        result - form result status
        model - Spring model instance
        redirectAttributes - model attributes storage to be propagated in a redirection
        Returns:
        The redirect request, or the login page on form error

                method=GET)
public String showSignup(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Shows the sign up form.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring model instance
        Returns:
        The sign up page

      • signup

        @RequestMapping(value="/signup",
                method=POST)
public String signup(@ModelAttribute(value="signupForm")
                                                                                     SignupForm form,
                                                                                     org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                     org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                                                     org.springframework.web.context.request.WebRequest request,
                                                                                     org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        New user sign up request, which will try to create a new account.
        Parameters:
        form - HTTP input request
        result - form result status
        redirectAttributes - model attributes storage to be propagated in a redirection
        request - Web request interface
        model - Spring model instance
        Returns:
        The redirect request to login path
